content.detailedDescription: Well, i was about thirteen years old. regular saturday morning going to the neighbor park down the street. it was a unusual morning cause of the silence and nobody was around. anyway, i arrived at the park with my bb gun looking for owls. i know, that's what i did as a kid. so, i'm looking through the trees and see an object sitting on top of a very high tree. what's so weird is this object was sitting on middle top which no way could support the weight on anything that looks like that. so i take aim and thought about shooting it. but once i really looked at it, i couldn't figure out what it could be. so i waited for someone to show up. after about 20 minutes , i decided to go and find a witness, but as soon as i went around the first house, i thought it would not be there when i returned. so i came back. that's when i became afraid. the object was gone, didn't hear it leave, but now i here the insects and birds even the wind blowing again. of course no one ever believed me. but it's a true story, just wanted to share this with you guys for some possible feedback. thanks
content.summary: Shaped like the bottom of a boat or football

content.detailedDescription: This object first appeared cigar shaped approx the size of a midsize building, 200+ft in length. moving slower than the speed required to keep man-made aircraft aloft. while it continued it's forward movement the nose of the craft rotated 90 degrees downward pointing directly at the ground and the tail end rotated 90 degrees upward. basically the entire craft rotated 90 degrees without changing course or speed. very very large craft and definitely not man made. i grew up and lived near a military base for 33 years and know a lot about aircraft and their capabilities. not even an osprey or harrier could maneuver this way without changing speed. it looked like a skyscraper laying on its side until it rotated. was in a car being driven by my mother who also witnessed this. believing we're not alone is one thing, seeing it first hand was unforgettable and alarming. i would be more than happy to attempt sketching the craft if mufon would find it helpful
content.summary: Object moved slowly and changed rotated 90 degrees

content.detailedDescription: Visiting garden of the gods in colorado springs, colorado. driving though the park taking pictures, i took 4 consecutive pictures at in the park not realizing it at the time picture number 3 of 4 an object appeared. i did not see the object when the picture was taken, only after reviewing the pictures on the camera did i see the object in the picture. the picture was taken on 3/6/15 at 9:37:10 (pic3), previous picture taken 9:36:59 (pic2). never actually saw the object. hoping you guys could tell what it might be. pic 4 was inadvertantly deleted before i released the object in pic 3, however did undelete it from sd card but don't have exact date and time unless it can be retrived from sd card.
content.summary: 1 of 4 pictures taken within seconds, did not see object  when picture was taken

content.detailedDescription: At 5:20pm on 5/31/2015 while on the balcony of my hotel room i observed what i thought was a bright star out over the water in south palm beach florida. when i viewed it through my camera's viewfinder using a 300mm (450 35mm equivalent)zoom i saw that it was rectangular in shape, very bright and stationary. i took various pictures over a period of about 40 minutes after which it seemed to slowly move further away getting dimmer until i could not see it anymore. my camera is equipped with internal shake reduction but that may have contributed to the blurry edges of the object due to the shutter speed used, although a ship on the horizon appears to have cleaner edges.  i've included various photos, slightly retouched in jpeg format and in their original raw file format. one is a composite i made with the object cropped in the frame. in another picture you can see a drone being flown by someone i assume on the beach, and another is a wide shot where you can crop in and see the object in the sky.
content.summary: Bright stationary rectangular object observed in the florida eastern sky over the water.

content.detailedDescription: It was about 2:30 am and my mom woke me up to come see the meteorite shower. so i went out on to the back porch and was watching the shower. then i saw one meteorite that really stuck out to me. it glowed very bright and was moving at a different pace then the other meteorites. it was moving in the same direction the whole time until it came to the peak of the hills that are way out in my backyard. it had to be many miles away from where i was sitting. it stopped. right above the peak of the hills. and it stayed there. as i was watching it i started to realize what it was. a ufo. my other family members weren't paying attention to the ufo. i had watched this object for about 5 minutes and then it just flew straight up into the sky and i completely lost sight of it. the thing is, when it flew away i felt as though i had been released. i mean i've watched ufo stories before and i was scared. i was really scared.
content.summary: Very bright very scary i felt like i had to watch it.

content.detailedDescription:
This is more an abduction case than a sighting. i would also like to add before i get started,  that my father has memories of being abducted at least 4 times in his life, and spoke with them. 
   ok... well i woke up one morning to find my girlfriend (diane jones)  starring at me, she instantly started crying and ran out of the room. after putting clothes on i went into the kitchen where she was, and she couldn't look at me. she was shaking and in shock. after about a half hour of talking and comforting her this is what she said. 
    it was in the middle of the night when she felt me moving in bed. when she rolled over and opened her eyes i was about a foot or 2 above the bed. the ceiling was glowing and there was a buzzing or humming sound. i was still rising up so she grabbed my hand to stop me. 
the next thing she knew she standing beside me, i was on a metallic table and there a small grey checking me with unknown metallic instruments. 
a tall grey came forward and with telepathy told her that they allowed her to come up to observe, to see that i wasn't being harmed. after watching them do something to me the next thing she knows we are being put back in bed. thinking that it was all a bad dream but knowing it wasn't, she stayed awake for the next couple hours watching me. until i woke up. 
    i dont know if there are memories as was aperantly not aware or even conscious. 
    i would be interested in a regression of this event or other events i may have blocked
content.summary: My girlfriend witnessed my abduction and was allowed to observe my examination, i was unconscious,  and have no memory of event.

content.detailedDescription:
I was laying down on couch around 930 with a headache tv muted lights out and i noticed these long red neon lights out my window going across church parking lot 2 doors down. i automatically new that something very strange was going on. i yelled out something to my myself and my daughter heard and came into the room i was motionless only half way sitting. she came into room and looked at me and followed my gaze out the window. at this point she said she was going to take a picture.When she came into the room i was able to stand up and go to the window with her. the windows were open and we could hear no sound but could feel a vibrating ohm through our body. the red neon lights i had seen were attached somehow it was blurry to a large cube van size super bright light.
the outside outline was blurry but it seemed that there was movement to the light within itself. there were many red beams 70-100 the were all different sizes up to 100 ft in length.The were at least 8 inches in diameter and had solid flat ends. the trees on the other side of street were red like the red from a heat lamp.This was close to power lines and three transformers on the pole that i could not see it was between us but closest to the pole the red lights retracted and the red glow faded and the immense brightness dimmed and it shrunk until it blinked twice and disappeared. it was very small when it blinked i remember seeing a silver type object that yellow blinked from.I do not know how long it was there or how long we actually saw it for it was 11 pm when all said and done. my daughter thinks they are following me, maybe cause i saw something as a child i have since moved as anxiety and having to be looking out the window all the time for its return.This pic is out the window and i can only give the size shape etc with drawing added  second pic is from internet its the closest i could find but still not quite the same as red lights i saw were solid and think with blunt flat ends and was much closer.My memory of event is very confusing cause i remember things that i do not recall happening...Like ignoring it and looking away doing something else but i was almost in a trance? i couldn't really move or think or speak until it was gone and we both thought afterwords that whatever it was in there knew we were watching it..If i held pie plate at arms length it would've just covered the center light
content.summary: I saw a bright light the size of a cube van two doors east i saw if from my living room window it was very bright with red neon lights extending up to 100 ft it disappeared in two yellow blinks,my daughter saw too and was going to take picture but couldnt

content.detailedDescription: Approx. midnight. went to let dogs out and they wouldn't go out. i turned on back yard light and noticed a light coming from above trees in back yard. high up on top of trees. felt sick to my stomach. turned off all lights in kitchen to see better and saw an orange triangle with a white circle light attached to it, on top of it. it made no noise. the triangle shape would pulsate from orange to red. my first thought was to run and hide as i was terrified but i thought this is  a ufo and i really need to look at it so i can remember it and try and document it. right after that i saw a white ball of light shoot out of it and roll down my lawn go under my fence into my neighbors yard. i got my cell phone, put it on video but it would not work. the same happened with the picture option.  i have a camera but for whatever reason, fear i guess it did not occur to get it. i came in the house, locked the doors, went to bed with all lights and tv on. i will have my camera ready tonight if it comes back.
content.summary: Triangle shape with white circle attached on top. triangle red but turning orange pulsing light.

content.detailedDescription:
this happened in 1963 in sawyer, michigan. i was a teenager and fishing on a little lake dug out for fill for i-94. it was roughly 9:30 pm when two little boys ( brothers of a friend ) yelled out and asked if i would take them for a ride in my boat. i rowed in and picked them up.

     we rowed around the lake and it was just about dark when i saw two people standing at the edge of the water on the i-94 side of the lake. i rowed over to them thinking they were two other friends who always fished the lake. i rowed up to them, maybe 15 feet away and started calling their names, no reply. it was dark and i couldn't make them out except in silhouette. i was about to row closer when the kids in the back started screaming and crying. i turned to them and they pointed to my left and i saw this object floating maybe 2 feet off the water maybe 100 feet away.

     the object was oval with a flattened bottom and maybe 10-20 feet wide. it's color was an opalescent white that did not reflect on the water. it didn't make a sound or disturb the surface of the water and seemed to slowing be coming toward us.

     when i realized something was very wrong i turned the boat around and headed for the opposite shore where we kept the boat. we were all scared to death and ran for the kids house as soon as we hit shore. i did not bother to look at the object again, i was scared and rowing my heart out.

     when we came into their house their mother and father started yelling at the three of us asking " where the hell were you ". i replied i took the boys for a boat ride and tried to explain what happened. they father cut me off saying "bullshit" they had combed the area by the lake and walked around it calling for the boys for the last hour and found nothing. i told that couldn't be as it just turned dark 20 minutes ago and we didn't see you or hear you. he pointed at the clock and it was 11:15 pm, i thought it was maybe 10.

     there is more to this but it's hard to explain here. this has bothered me since that day and simply had to get it off my chest.

rick
content.summary: 3 of us witnesed 2 entities and an opalescent object

content.detailedDescription:
Hello.

i had my first experience with 'ufo's', that i'm aware of, was around july of 2006. this experience took place during a trip to cape breton from ontario. i drove alone and preferred to travel by night. it was somewhere around new brunswick that i noticed, what i first thought was a helicopter. it followed me all the way through to cape breton. i had a sunroof in my vehicle that allowed me to see it come and go.
this "vehicle", not only followed me through my trip there, but also during my return trip back to north bay. 
i'm not sure what to think; who to speak to, or even if i am mental! but they continue to visit occasionally, and although i have never seen an entity, i know that i am being communicated with. they are telling me to write but i feel like i'll be ridiculed and lose the respect of my community and my profession. what i have in my head seems important, but i really don't know how to do so without sacrificing my life, as well as my teenage children and wife's life.

i ask that this confidential.
if you can...

please help?!?

john perry
705-477-9359
content.summary: Ongoing since 2006. communication of some kind. telling me to write but i'm scared for my family.

content.detailedDescription: It's about 2:30 in the afternoon very sunny day no clouds in the sky.  my friend and i and older next door neighbor we're walking to the beach. as we walk along the boardwalk in the sand dunes as soon as we saw the ocean,, about 10 or 12 or more lights ascended down from space. they began zigzagging across the sky extremely fast faster than anything ever. they were pulsating flashing and zig zagging. we watch this for 35 minutes or more with hundreds of people on the beach watching it as well. then about that time, 2 jet fighters flew in from the south breaking the sound barrier.That was the first time i had ever seen a jet breaking the sound barrier in real life. as soon as the jets got to the location generally of the lights, the lights shot straight up in to space seemingly. as we follow the lights up, we see another object this one is very big and is right over top of us. it seems to be camouflage or cloaked with 3 red lights on each in of the triangular shaped craft.While we are looking straight up at this object, the military jets are flying around in circles trying to track the objects that had shot straight up into space. this lasted a good 45 minutes. daytime absolutely clear sky. the triangular shaped object seem too high for the jets to get too.Then the objects seemingly faded away into the distance until we couldn't see it anymore it was very big.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Daytime light fell from space.Orb like flashing very fast and moving in a zigzag patern back and forth across the sky super fast right in front of us with lots of people seeing to over 100.Lasted 40mn then 2 jet fighters flew in from the south breakisound

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog and heard the university hospital helicopter warming up.  while watching the helicopter depart a light was descending and approaching the  hospital.  the light caught my attention because it was in my line of sight of the helicopter.  i first viewed the light at approximately 1000 ft agl,45 -60 degrees above the horizon, moderate brightness, slight flicker.  the light grew brighter and larger in size leading me to assume it was closing the distance on the helicopter as well as descending.  at its lowest altitude; i'd guess it neared 300-400 ft agl and approximately 0.50 miles away.  it looked like a landing light of an approaching aircraft.  the helicopter began to depart from the roof of the hospital and the light hovered in place and ceased its decent.  once the helicopter was clear of the hospital the light made a quick adjustment to a more southerly position and ascended back the same direction from which it originated.  i was able to follow the light during its ascent, but it quickly faded with distance.  i am a pilot with well over 500 hrs pic, i am not under the influence of drugs or alcohol, i am certain this was not an aircraft as i have never seen a craft make such directional changes and ascend at that speed without any noise whatsoever.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Watching med helicopter depart and observed light descending and approaching helicopter, hovered, abruptly changed direction and ascended when helicopter was clear of the hospital.

content.detailedDescription: I was visiting my setp daughter in kenosha last summer. she does not allow smoking in the apartment so we had to go sit out on the porch to have a cigarette so i went out to do so. earlier that day we had gone to the lake which is a few miles away from her apartment and while having my cigarette i was looking in the direction of the lake recalling our day when i saw an object fly up as if it just came out of the lake and hover for about 20 or 30 seconds, it flew out and up to this point extremely fast!!! and i mean like in a split second fast! and the stop was abrupt. so abrupt that if it were an elevator everything inside would be smashed from the stop!! and then after hovering for a little while it took off like a shot of lightning (actually much faster than a bolt of lightning)and flew straight up and was gone! i couldn't see the lake or the point of where it came from but judging from the size and approxemently how far away it appeared to be it had to come out of lake michigan and besides that the speed at which i saw it fly up to its hovering point was unwaivered,it was flying just as fast at the point of where i first saw it till it stopped!!So unless it could take off at that extreme speed it had to be in motion before ground level. this is not the only time that i have seen a ufo though! the other time was when i was a kid somewhere around 1980 give or take a year and i think i may have been abducted that time. and it was a series of events that happened all that summer and really freeks me out and makes the hair on my skin stand up to this day! i know what i saw in kenosha last year and i would really like to talk with someone at mufon about the events that happened when i was young. i have kept this in long enough and really need to speak with someone professional about it! and i don't mean a doctor i mean a ufo professional! i know this is just me saying i saw something but i would not lie about any of this and i truly believe in ufo's and in what i saw and heard in all the events!
content.summary: I saw an object fly out of the lake and stop and hover for about 20 or 30 seconds and take off

content.detailedDescription:
Have always wanted to report this since i was a kid. my farther and i went to the gorcery store late one evening. i was about 8 or 9 ct pm and i stayed in the car. it had just got dark outside and i had been in the car for about 30 mins while my dad shopped. i had my head out the window of the car while in the parking lot with parking lot light near. i saw 5 lights clustered together with one leading light heading west to east. i saw the light cluster break apart and each light go its separate way. example the leading light continued heading east and each of the other 4 stars heading north, south and other two head back north and south west. lights were white and total observation was 7 seconds.

the picture attached is one i found on the internet and is the closest to what i saw. in the attached phone/drawing the lines between the crat were not visiable. i saw just the white lighs moving as written above.
content.summary: 5 lights making star shape and heading east one light leading and all 5 broke apart and went in stright line outwards.

content.detailedDescription:
1)   coming home from the storr
2)    my vision was even with the die whe descending a hill
3).    was facing the sky when i noticed a sta r size object pop up over the horizon
4).   the object passed over head, my eyes returned to there original forward vision. from the exact original viewing position the object again passed over head. again it passed and again my eyes returned to the foward viewing position. on the third pass just about eyes looking straight or slightly higher the object came to a dead stop. would of blended it with the surroundings stars if you didn't see it pass over head the other two times. after a minute of so the light simply faded away
5).  i was in shock at hoe fast it passed over head and really supprised at how it just came to a dead stop
6).  it its stationary position it simply slowly faded away.
content.summary: Stopped dead on third pass

content.detailedDescription: Look, i know it sounds crazy, but i have been in touch with 'them' for decades now. i was chosen as a human keeper of knowledge. now, i have been told to share (as have others so might be hearing from others) so that we can formally document and distribute the knowledge so that mankind came make some hard decisions in the coming days. please contact me. i am quite serious.
content.summary: I have been communicating with 'them'.

content.detailedDescription: 6 close friends were heading home from a night of partying. i know, i know, but we were sober. there were also two cars. when something in the sky just appeared. pretty high up there but very noticible. we call to car behind us but phone wouldn't work. we pull over to ask the people behind us if they saw it also. we couldn't get a word off as they were yelling the same to us. it was large and metallic. large and in a thin "blimp", like shape. fuzzy lights although it was a clear morning. no vapor trail at all. came to a complete stop, held for a minute, then dissapeared suddenly. i am pretty sure no one saw it disappear. strange since there were six people.  it was clearly not a plane. in fact, you could see a plane in the sky with it. hence the scale roughly given. we were all pretty amazed and couldn't believe the other car also saw the same event. proving we were not imagining the event that unfolded that night.
content.summary: 6 people in two cars saw something. we also couldn't reach car by cell.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my home , outside & saw a shimmering light heading ne over the mountain , then golf course. it stopped over the 7th tee-box , a flattened area.  it shone a light down (but not like a tight "tractor-beam" light , more of a light that got dimmer as it radiated outward).  the course is only an easy 9-iron away , about 60 yards. it hovered above that area for about 15-20 minutes , then started to descend , but b4 reaching the ground , it faded out.  during the sighting , the local police came , & very shortly after that , a helicopter shows up too. it showed up too soon for the cops to have called anyone after they arrived. the golf-course filled up with more & more people as time went on & many saw it. i spoke to the officer there about it 2 times. at the sighting he said it was a ufo (he had no clue what it was either) , & a few years after the ordeal , he said... " you were there , you saw it , it was just a helicopter "!  go figure , eh?
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Seelf-illuminating craft going northast, then over local golf-corse. then hovered above 7th-tee-off & eventually descended. as it did, it shimmered and disappeared b4 it fully landed. many witnesses. (40-60)

content.detailedDescription:
While out on my deck having a cigarette, i looked at the stars like i often do.  this night being blessed to see jupiter and venus almost setting.  while looking west at the stars and planets over the sooke hills, through a gap between a horse chestnut tree and a stand of cedars, a red-orange, shimmering orb-like object hovered.  the distance seemed about a half of a kilometer away and no more than 200-300 feet in the sky.  i took my phone out to video and as i did so, the object seemed to start moving toward my direction.  there were no sounds.  the object then stopped and started off back the way it came, until it disappeared in its spot.
the second object became noticeable when the other left and observer was searching the sky, but felt as if it was there the whole time too.  same color and shimmering.  the object moved along a short path before dimming and then disappearing.
content.summary: One red-orange shimmering orb, hovering then approached, then reproached and disappeared instantly.  the second more hovered, then dimmed, then dissappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was awoken by some lights dancing around my living room. they were like the red laser pointers going around directly above my head as i awoke.  my initial thought was someone was outside with a firearm or something. i got up and approached the window. the curtains were closed. as i i opened the curtains i noticed 3 to 4 beings about 3 ft tall wearing black hooded robes. i initially thought they were children, however it was 3:00 am in the morning. i had a real scared feeling. they noticed me right away as they were standing 15ft infront of my balcony. the beings immediately darted off in all directions. i immediately ran outside to catch one of them fleeing, however there was no sign of anything or anybody. i circled the block looking and searching down the alleys but to no avail. there was an eery silence as our block has lots of dogs.  i can only hope that this experience has happened to someone else.
content.summary: Around 10 years ago i experienced a weird experience that i would be interested in knowing if anyone else has had the same experience ?

content.detailedDescription: In october of 1965, i was seventeen, and i was returning home from a school concert at  about 9:00 pm with my friend's family; it was my friend, her sister, little brother, and her mom and dad.  as they drove up my street we saw a shiny, silvery white fat cigar -shaped object coming from our left, coasting over the woods behind my house.  we stopped the car, turned off the engine, and all of us climbed out; watching the object move over the woods.  it didn't make a sound, moving pretty fast.  suddenly it stopped dead, hovering over one of the tallest trees;  i'd guess the tree was about 50 feet high.  it sat there, as if  watching us for maybe 4 minutes or so; giving us the opportunity to really look at it.  it had soft orange lights pulsing on either end of the cigar shape sphere.  there was a strip from end to end of windows, bluish white from within and we could just make out some faint shadowy figures; couldn't make out any features.  we were stunned, because we all saw and watched it.  being a teenager, i was more excited than scared.  it seemed to be looking at us too.  after those 4 minutes, as we watched, it shot straight up like lightening, disappearing into the night, still without any sound!  two evenings later, my friend and her sister and i were sitting outside their house on their back patio,  and there it was again, still coming from our left, a little higher up, and just as silent;  it passed over us and headed onto the right and disappeared.  we never saw it again. i guess we weren't the only ones to notice that ufo, because for several days after the sighting, the local airport about a half hour drive from where we lived was innundated with calls about the object.  i felt calm and full of wonder, having witnessed such a thing, and if i had any doubts about other life and beings existing in our incredible universe, they were completely laid to rest then and there!  since then its been fabulous learning about the universe we live in.  i'm not afraid;  if whatever is out there wanted us destroyed, they certainly would have been capable of doing that by now.
content.summary: Driving home approaching my house;  object came across the sky from the left, hovered over tree, then shot up and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing behind the bleachers at my high school during a friday night game with a friend. i don't remember the exact moment i saw it but just seeing this orange glowing ball hovering directly over the high school. i stood there shocked and fixed on as was she. it did not make any noise. as her and i were watching it, we were cracking jokes that they must be wondering what is going on under the lights (referring to the football game). several people walked past and we pointed it out to them. many just blew it off as a helicopter just in total denial of what we were seeing. my friend eventually moved on while i stayed there fixed on it. after about 10 minutes it started to move slowly in a northwesterly direction,then went into a hyperdrive and disappeared.
content.summary: Football fans

content.detailedDescription:
I went to my backyard to play with three baby chickens before going to school, middle school. my parents purchased the animals to please me since we just moved from chicago. i awoke extra early. as i held the three chicks, a flash of silver in the sky, to my left, caught my eye. 

then the light zigzagged to the right, then left and finally, to the right and paused just slightly above me. the top and bottom spun left but the center spun right. the center has shiny black windows. the aircraft tilted and zoomed in even closer. shocked i didn't move or breathed. i remember praying. at that moment i knew what i was looking at. the space ship hummed and the dark windows cleared. i saw people, not many. i felt like they spotted me all alone and came to see what i was doing.

 i remember having two conversations. one, i was praying and the second, i was explaining what i was doing and why i didn't like moving to miami.  i couldn't understand how i was having two conversations. the back of my mind unlocked with pictures. it's going to be okay, said a voice. then the windows smoked, the ship straightened, hummed louder and whoosh, zoomed right behind the trees and then left...Back where it came from leaving a trail of light. 

several  months later, in the early morning, my cousin took his mom to work. they lived with us. well, they saw a creature with no hair, big black eyes and no clothes with long dangling  arms just hovering above the street. they swirled to avoid hitting it. i think they hit a mailbox but the point is, it returned, this alien was seen a few houses down from mine. 

years later, teaching the real estate law class, we were discussing paranormal encounters and disclosures when a student who lived in venezuela said he saw a space ship come up from the water late at night while he worked in a hotel. he described the same ship and windows and how it unsmoked and cleared. but he got a better view of them. i had the sun in my eyes. he said the day after an earthquake hit chile.

then, years later, while showing a house, i walked into the bedroom and wham, the walls and ceilings were covered in newspaper clippings of ufo's. the ceiling was space with orbiting planets. the aunt apologized. said her grandson is fixated ever since spotting them. but on the wall was a clipping with a sketch of an alien seen in miami during heavy fog and it matched the description of my aunt and cousin's encounter. i have not seen anymore ufo's since.....But, is it possible they can walk through walls?  
this is my story...
i have no proof but i am positive it can be verified.
i believe in them because i know what i saw, felt and heard.
we are in no way prepared for this. in my humble opinion, you cannot negotiate with a higher mind and a superior race.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright light in sky like lightning but traveling. it zoomed left and right until it hovered near me.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my back yard at 10:36 am after throwing the ball for my dog. i was sitting facing west and looked up in the sky. there were no clouds, however there were 5 white circular objects flying in unison back and forth in the sky. i thought they were birds, but they would get brighter and were moving in a slow uniform pattern. i though this was interesting and i had my cell phone with me so i recorded it. after 6 minutes and 7 seconds the 5 objects disappeared. they faded into the sky and were not seen again during my time in the yard.
content.summary: While in the back yard, i looked up and saw 5 round white objects flying in unison so i recorded it with my cell phone

content.detailedDescription: In august of 1993, there was to be a huge meteor shower. my sibling and i were watching for meteors. he was standing on back of the deck looking over the house and yelled for me to come look as he sees a ufo. ofcourse, i did not believe him but went and stood up on the seats at the back of the deck. i felt in aw and scared at the same time. it was a silver saucer just hovering a little beyond the house just over the treeline. the entire bottom had blue lights and i could see what i can only describe as rivets on the side of the ufo. it did not make any noise or movement. we watched it for a few minutes then ran inside for fear that they were watching us. we went back outside a short time later, maybe a couple minutes and it was gone. my sibling does not recall this encounter. i recall going to school the next day or so and talking to classmates to find my sibling and i were not the only ones who saw it. the classmates claimed seeing it 1 town over about 3hrs before our encounter.
content.summary: Flying saucer out for the meteor shower

content.detailedDescription: Look at millwright working on shipping galley lolling up saw this thing going north when the behind clood cover.  never came out
content.summary: Hi in sky going north in jet path when the behind clouds and gone

content.detailedDescription: I, along with my ex-wife and two friends from my same street were seated on the home team side of the stadium app. half way up facing east. during the halftime home coming events on the field i witnessed a 2 foot diameter orb traveling horizontally from north to south over the field. the object was not like the 2 dimensional translucent orbs seen in most pictures after development. this object was a solid 3d sphere, not a light. its color was a bluish green. it was traveling between 80 and 100 mph. the entire sighting lasted a little over 2 seconds. it traveled over the eastern hatch marks on the field and was slightly lower than the field lights. nearly ever person was focused on the homecoming court down on the field. upon seeing the orb i immediately notified my friends. two of the three were able to see the orb before it rapidly faded out of site. the object had very sharp defining edges no blurs or fuzziness, the inside seemed to be made of plasma, it was not extremely bright and flew in a perfectly strait and flat trajectory. the most interesting part of the story came later.
content.summary: Beach ball size blue green sphere travels noiseless accross football field

content.detailedDescription: We were a grorwrrup of people saw6-12 silver orbs
content.summary: About six to ten silver orbs going across the mountains

content.detailedDescription: On front porch sitting on the phone, thought i saw a new star or how you see them when you do not look directly at them they come in to sight better ,or maybe i thought since the motion light went off that's why i seen it,  then it dissappeared, came back then stayed still , then came somewhat in my direction growing in size thought , may be falling star well nope it stopped was a goldenish, whitish color. after being still it went directly right in a straightline, stopped back left, right then stopped, i'm thinking star, i dnt think so ,flares no way, going through a what could this be check list, before getting to excited or made fun of by cousin and nothing close to this, then it goes up and to the right stops , it looks looks round until it starts looking tilted like and like a oval and a tiny light comes out of it a little (star) it stays still then goes straight up the other light stays a second then goes fast up and to the right then starts skipping i called it, then dissappeared, in wow still. didn't hear a word my cousin said when i really understood this star was not normal i didn't probably difnt hasve time and did not want to miss what i was seeing now , i want to kno what i was seeing thought i should report this. 11:30 pm-12am occurred, 6/25/15
content.summary: On the front porch smoking thought it was a glowing star but caught my eye, got really bright coming towards me , was still then went backwards into nothing then came forward then still to the right and then straight up and to the right like it was skip

content.detailedDescription:
Era de media noche yo me encontraba parado tratando de avistar ovnis...
era una noche calida y despejada! 
esa noche vi muchos objetos voladores no identificados pero los que mas me llamaron la atencion fueron esos 4 objetos voladores no identificados volando en silencio y a una altura de 39 metros aproximadamente...Destaco que al momento del avistamiento tenia puesto anteojos para ver mejor (ya que sufro problema de la vista /miopia/bueno..El caso es que estaba parado tratando de avistar algo hasta que de repente observo una flotilla de 4 objetos en forma de "v" mas 1 que los iba vigilando a unos escasos 2 metros aproximadamente...! 
eran de color naranja y no emitian ruido alguno y volaban en trayecoria fija!
en ese momento me agarro una emocion y miedo muy fuerte los dos a la vez!Y luego me retire del lugar.
content.summary: 4 objetos en forma de "v" mas uno custodiandolos a una distancia de 3 metros
